column4: Could somebody help me with some ATI/fglrx driver problems I'm having?  I've followed the howto and it's still coming up with mesa drivers.
what does your /etc/XF86Config-r say at the Driver keyword under Device
what does /var/log/XFree86.0.log say. does it give any errors or warnings that could have anything to do with fglrx
no that appears to be a normal warning, i have it too. (and my driver is working.)
okay.  There is a lot of fglrx activity after that, I'm still looking for a warning/error.
DRI initialization failed (maybe driver kenel module missing or bad)
mmm i'll upload my XF86Config, perhaps it's a settings thing.
your device section is massive compared to mine.  I'm going to run through fglrxconfig and see if that fixes it.
well my experience with fglrxconfig is that it makes a very very very messy file, basicly i copy&pasted the device section :)
well then i'm out of idea's. for me my radeon 'just worked'
